channel.title: koRpus.lang.es
channel.description: Adds support for the Spanish language to the 'koRpus' package. To ask for help, report bugs, suggest feature improvements, or discuss the global development of the package, please consider subscribing to the koRpus-dev mailing list (<https://korpusml.reaktanz.de>).

item.title: Changes in koRpus.lang.es version 0.1-2
item.description:
fixed

  • removed hard coded abbreviations from global TT.tknz.opts in preset, to enable checks for file names by koRpus

  • added MWL lookup to windows parameters

  • package name in license header

changed

  • renamed abbreviations and parameter files omitting the "-utf8" suffix

  • updated README.md

  • removed methods from list of imported packages

added

  • support optional arguments for koRpus::set.lang.support()

item.title: Changes in koRpus.lang.es version 0.1-1
item.description:
changed

  • initial release as standalone package
